oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis and Harahan Bridges (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Memphis and Harrihan Bridges, Spanning Mississippi River, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“Miss Alma Carmichael -- Martin, -- Tenn. -- R.7.D.6. -- Hello Old Top! -- Are having a wonderful -- time. Wish you were with -- me. How’s everybody there? -- We have so many things -- planned to do while I’m -- here. Have an invitation to -- dinner tonight with a -- girl friend I roomed with in -- school. Lots of love, Tell E. hello. -- Love to your mother. Mary Louise”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mississippi River; rivers; Harahan Bridge; railroads; railways;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Curteich-Chicago C.T. American Art ; Collection processed by Angela Price
